title: Bailout Corporations
description: Save big businesses to protect jobs.

title: Ban Smoking
description: Go against the corporate lobbing, burn down the tobacco industry.

title: Do Nothing
description: This is politics, isn't this what happens in the end?

title: Institute Universal Basic Income
description: Everyone has basic costs covered, but work still needs to be done. How do the people feel about stuff for nothing?

title: Invest in Fossil Fuels
description: Lot of jobs, but at what cost?

title: Increase Military Spending
description: The people need protection, who are you to deny it?

title: Institute Basic Rights for All
description: Companies claim they cant use user data now, but we must protect the people

title: Protect Wildlife
description: What? You want to build your factory in this park?

title: France
description: Baguettes? Wine? Disliking the English? what else is there?

title: Automate Menial Jobs
description: People will be much happier without those boring, repetitive, easily replaceable jobs

title: Privatize Rail
description: What could go wrong? said the iron lady

title: Improve Weapons Trade
description: We need better pointy sticks if they have pointier sticks!

title: Support Mothers Needs
description: We have to boost birth rates somehow!

title: Form an International Union
description: Maybe its across Europe? maybe it will make the nations united?

title: Free Public Housing
description: But wait? why is it near the factories
